portofolio.name: Simple StackOverflow list view
portofolio.description: Next.js application that serves as a comprehensive Q&A platform tailored for developers. It provides a robust environment for developers to ask questions, share knowledge, and collaborate on various programming topics.

portofolio.name: Comparing company datas with AI
portofolio.description: Platform designed to help users compare company data and make informed decisions. With features like advanced search and data upload options, it provides a streamlined experience for analyzing and contrasting company metrics. This tool is ideal for professionals, investors, and decision-makers seeking a comprehensive view to support their strategic choices.

portofolio.name: US Flight Delay - 2022
portofolio.description: This interactive Tableau dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of flight delays across the United States in 2022. It offers insights into various factors influencing delays, such as: Geographical Distribution or Delay Causes
